name: Solitaire - Play, Earn Bitcoin
description:
Play the ORIGINAL Solitaire card game for FREE on iOS and earn bitcoin. Enjoy the classic most popular card game in the world - Solitaire. Get rewarded to play & earn bitcoin! Complete endless Solitaire with great graphics and easy gameplay to EARN Bitcoin as you go for FREE!

Fun new features are added every few days. The most addictive computer game, is now available on mobile with crypto rewards. Also known as Patience, Klondike or simply Solitaire, you will enjoy playing the most popular card game with an exciting interface. Multiplayer mode to play with your friends online.

Challenging Solitaire game that lets you earn bitcoin. Check your stats and compete with people from across the world. More points, higher bitcoin payouts.

—HOW TO PLAY—
Move around and sort the cards into piles of their suits starting with the ace and WIN! The quicker the time, the MORE SKILLED you are!
Best graphics and engaging gameplay for daily win and incredible bitcoin rewards.
Earn bitcoin daily. Thousands of users win bitcoin daily. An endless game so you can win real bitcoin.

Now you can make bitcoin by playing solitaire! Lots of levels and daily bitcoin win in this incredibly challenging Solitaire game.

–TOP FEATURES–

Thousands of levels for endless entertainment.
*Solitaire Fun*

Train your brain!
*Bitcoin Galore*

Play & Earn Bitcoin at any moment!
*Fun and Free*

Play endless Solitaire Levels.
Earn Bitcoin for free!

Download now to play for FREE, and become the ultimate Solitaire master!
